text: VMware cloud on AWS brings VMware's
enterprise class software-defined data
center software to the AWS cloud with
optimized and seamless access to the
comprehensive portfolio of AWS services
you can track metrics monitor log files
and set alarms to gain valuable insights
on the application performance and
system-wide operational health here's
how leverage the high-performance highly
secure an innovative nitro based Amazon
ec2 bare-metal infrastructure to power
your VMware vSphere based sddc workloads
on the AWS cloud 4 hybrid cloud
workloads you can use Amazon Kinesis
firehose agent to collect and send logs
to Kinesis firehose Kinesis firehose is
a fully managed service for delivering
real-time streaming data to destinations
like Amazon simple storage service use
Amazon virtual private cloud flow logs
to capture information about IP traffic
going to and from network interfaces in
Amazon VP see information includes IPS
protocols number of packets bytes
timestamp action taken and so on with a
few clicks you can use Amazon quick site
to build visualizations perform analysis
and quickly obtain insights into your
hybrid architecture the ability to
capture and analyze system and
application data using pay-as-you-go AWS
services saves you time and money
rapidly build and deploy a flexible
scalable hybrid cloud architecture by
extending your on-premises
infrastructure and workloads to the AWS
cloud with VMware cloud on AWS and the
comprehensive powerful and innovative
AWS services without needing custom

applications or modifying your operating
